item.title: Carvel, formerly k14s, aims to simplify application deployment atop Kubernetes
item.description: Now that you’ve deployed Kubernetes, how do you get apps up and running atop the container runtime? Carvel (formerly known as k14s), a collection of open-source tools for working with Kubernetes, is designed to answer this question. Carvel was born from frustration with existing tools Â¶Carvel is a set of tools designed to ease lifecycle management of your Kubernetes workloads. The origin of Carvel begins with Dmitriy Kalinin and Nima Kaviani not being satisfied with existing tools to deploy Kubernetes workloads.
